mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.value AS "value", a.label AS "label", a.type AS "type", a.description AS "description", a.sort AS "sort", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_dict a
AND a.type = #{type}
AND a.description LIKE concat('%', #{description}, '%')
ORDER BY a.type, a.sort, a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dict( id, value, label, type, description, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{value}, #{label}, #{type}, #{description}, #{sort}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dict SET value = #{value}, label = #{label}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
